subject: Bicycles and Bicycling
Tour de Suisse (Bicycle Race)
lead_paragraph: Matteo Trentin held off Daniele Bennati in a final sprint to win the sixth stage of the Tour de Suisse. Tony Martin retained his overall lead.
snippet: Matteo Trentin held off Daniele Bennati in a final sprint to win the sixth stage of the Tour de Suisse. Tony Martin retained his overall lead.
